ygData.subject: Re: Dark Elf SK
ygData.msgSnippet: The item that you are looking for is the Traveller s Backpack. If you are on Mithaniel Marr, I have one on sale. In fact, since I have been trying to sell the
ygData.messageBody:
The item that you are looking for is the Traveller's Backpack. If you are on Mithaniel Marr, I have one on sale. In fact, since I have been trying to sell the following on Mithaniel Marr with no success, I might as well try to advertise it here:

- Combine Two Handed Sword x 2
- Combine Long Sword
- Tentacle Whip (Lifetap effect)
- Small Bronze Mask
- Small Bronze Splinted Cloak (or something like that)
- Traveller's Backpack (decreases the weight of items within the backpack)
- Velvet Choker (Forgot the stats, but I believe it was +5HP)
- Skull of Jhen'Tra (+20 MANA, +3 SV MAGIC)
- Stiletto of the Bloodclaw (6/23, 20HP lifedraw)
- Blackened Iron Tunic
- Blackened Iron Bracer
- Barbed Leather Whip
- Small Banded Armor

If you are interested in any of these items, please email me at hchan@...
And to those of you who think I 'cheated' to obtained those, you are correct, a level 75 has given me all this stuff for free.


I was just making an observation with this statement. The only packs I know of that add about zero weight are a shaman summon spell, and that bag disappears as soon as you logout, as well as the items stored in the bag. Also these bags only have 4 slots, and have heard you can place 15 lbs. bricks of ore into them and it apples only a fraction of the weight to your encumbrance load (which is good for hunting ... rock dervs(?) in fire storm that give you these bricks). I WISH they would come out with a magic backpack that would do this, that wouldn't disappear at logout time. (how about that =)
